I got right into your esnips.  Looked around...listened to your sessions, which we clear to me for the most part...some day I trust I will get there too.  I need more time getting acquainted to esnips both as a postor and listener but it seems to offer easier controls and is faster to access from email.  I like it at first blush.  Ron L

bhali333 <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:          Hey guy's 

I just posted a bunch of RS 470 files to esnips here's the link if you 
would like to give a listen.

http://www.esnips.com/web/RSBoxFiles

Let me know what you think.

Bruce
